name: Xenophilius Lovegood
description: Highly eccentric father of Luna and editor of The Quibbler
skills: Knowledgeable on an array of magical items
Wizards don’t know a lot about (or don’t believe exist)
hobbies: Learning about all manner of eclectic magical objects
Creatures – from Crumple-Horned Snorkacks to the Deathly Hallows
